sect1.title: Installation as Extension
sect1.para: For using the &hasi; and &hageo;, you need the packages included in the following installation patterns:

step.para: To install the packages from both patterns via command line, use Zypper:
step.screen: sudo zypper in -t pattern ha_sles ha_geo

step.para: Alternatively, use &yast; for a graphical installation:
Start &yast; as &rootuser; user and select Software Software Management .
Click View Patterns and activate the following patterns:
Click Accept to start installing the packages.

important.title: Installing Software Packages on all Parties
important.para: The software packages needed for &ha; and &geo; clusters are not automatically copied to the cluster nodes.

listitem.para: Install &sls; &productnumber; and the &ha; and &geo; Clustering for &ha; patterns on all machines that will be part of your &geo; cluster.
If you do not want to install the packages manually on all nodes that will be part of your cluster, use &ay; to clone existing nodes. Find more information at .
For all machines that need the &geo; clustering extension, you currently need to install the packages for &geo; clusters manually. &ay; support for &hageo; is not yet available.
